Description: This template creates one connection of type 'Cluster' for a given stream instance in the specified project

Profile.Description: Secret Manager Profile that contains the Atlas Programmatic keys

WorkspaceName.Description: Human-readable label that identifies the stream workspace

ConnectionName.Description: Human-readable label that identifies the stream connection

BootstrapServers.Description: Comma separated list of server addresses

AuthMechanism.Description: Style of authentication. Can be one of PLAIN, SCRAM-256, or SCRAM-512

AuthUsername.Description: Username of the account to connect to the Kafka cluster

AuthPassword.Description: Password of the account to connect to the Kafka cluster. Review [AWS security best practices for CloudFormation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/security-best-practices.html#creds) to manage credentials.

SecurityProtocol.Description: Describes the transport type. Can be either PLAINTEXT or SSL

BrokerPublicCertificate.Description: A trusted, public x509 certificate for connecting to Kafka over SSL
